text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: ——An ancient philosopher once said:

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: "To gain joy through incidents arousing pity and fear; That purification of emotion, is catharsis." In other words——

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: "Moe" is the purification of my very soul!!! The love and awe I offer my faves illuminate my soul like a ray of hope——!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: ——Oh. Just a dream, huh…

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: (My name is Agnes Digital. Just a normal, garden-variety Umamusume.)

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: (Today, like always, I take in the air through an invisible filter. After all, I'm at——)

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: (A place so full of my faves that I wouldn't even dare breathe the same air—— Tracen Academy! Something's bound to happen in an Umamusume-chan paradise like this…!)

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Now hang on, you, just how long are you going to keep following me?!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: I'm not, dang it! I'm going to the track too! I'm the one who oughtta tell you to stop following me!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: (Ehhhh!? They're pretending to argue, just to have an excuse to stop and talk to each other!? Right…!?)

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: (Even though they could've run off without a word?! What is going on here?! What sort of feelings are driving them?!)

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: (It's got to be… feelings… for each other…!!!?)

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: (Ha～～～ I t ' s t o o G O O D ! ! ! ! !)

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: (——That's right, I enrolled just to see my faves up close!! I stand here, now, for the sake of experiencing those "Best Fave Moments"!!)

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: (As always, Tracen Academy… IS THE BEEEEEEEEST!!!!)

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text: Good work again today, Trainer-san. Are you settled in to the academy already?

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text: There's quite a variety of talented Umamusume enrolled here. I encourage you to find someone you'd like to train with ♪
——Tracen Academy. The institution dedicated to training the Umamusume who race in the Twinkle Series.
I worked really hard and finally managed to become a trainer at the Academy. I may be inexperienced, but I'd like to think my passion makes up for it.
choice_data_list: (Time to give it my all today, too!)
(Time to give it my all today, too!)

text_block_list.text: I psyched myself up and went down to observe the running Umamusume. Seeing them giving it their all, I couldn't help but raise my fist and cheer.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Ghh… She really gets on my nerves…! Always butting into my space——

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: No way am I going to lose to her!!
Yes——! You may stand among the great and powerful! But you are undeniably a goddess in your own right!!
I exist to kneel before thy brilliance!
Rightgeousness! Pweciousness! You're our holy goddeeeeess～～～～!!!!
With our cheers behind her, she pushed through the last straight at incredible speed…!!
Feeling pretty pleased with things, I took a curious glance beside me——

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: Wheeze… wheeze… huff… huff…

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: She felt the threat of her pursuers, but turned that fear into her power. Power enough to push through those last three furlongs…

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: And the moment she crossed the finish line, oh, she just couldn't help but smile! Ahhh, that blessed smile is our divine reward! Don't you agree!?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: What?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: Ah. Sorry. My inner asuras were going wild… Umamusume-chans are the best, amirite? Hehehhe…

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: I could feel it, you know. You, too, infuse your cheers with a passionate karma. As a fellow traveller on this karmic path, I can't afford to fall behind…
I kind of got caught up in the flow there, but I wonder what she's up to. Wait, is she not going to run too?
choice_data_list: Sorry, do you have a second?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: Wh- There's no way. …Wait, now they're running together!? But didn't you just say "she really gets on my nerves"…!!!?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: Wait, then, you mean, she was hiding how she really felt!? WHAAA～! My oh my, what forbidden fruit!! Le mariage of sweet and bitter—

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: ——Oh. Yeah!? What's up…!?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: Oh, was I being too loud…? Would you accept an Umamusume-chan anecdote as an apology?
choice_data_list: Are you not going to run?
Are you not going to run?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: …Hwuh? Me?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: Whaaat? Nonono!! You just got to see those precious Umamusume-chans run, and you're going to say something like that!?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: Nope, nope, that's no good! No running from me! None! None! Absolutely none!
choice_data_list: But aren't you a student here?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: Look, I know, but I won't do it!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: It'd be like the fall of the Tower of Babel! The final Armageddon! If I go out there without steeling myself it'll turn out all wishy-was—— Never mind! Anyway!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: Saying you want to see me run after getting to see those unbearably precious Umamusume-chans run is like saving room for natto after dessert!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: 100% would not recommend! Now then. See you later, Umamusume-chan-loving Trainer!
…And there she goes.
There's something off about her. I'm a little curious how on earth it'd turn out if she really did run.
